100.name: Sharp Shots
100.description: Can pop 1 extra Bloon per shot.

200.name: Razor Sharp Shots
200.description: Can pop 2 more bloons per shot.

300.name: Spike-O-Pult
300.description: Converts the Dart Monkey into a Spike-o-pult that hurls a large spiked ball instead of darts. Good range, but slower attack speed. Each ball can pop lots of Bloons and rebounds off obstacles.

400.name: Juggernaut
400.description: Hurls a giant spiked ball that pops lead and excels at crushing Ceramic Bloons.

500.name: Ultra Juggernaut
500.description: Gigantic spiked ball splits twice into 6 Juggernaut balls for even more destructive power.

030.name: Triple Shot
030.description: Throws 3 darts at a time instead of 1.

040.name: Super Monkey Fan Club
040.description: Super Monkey Fan Club Ability: Converts up to 10 nearby Dart Monkeys including himself into Super Monkeys for 15 seconds. Regular attack speed also increased.

050.name: Plasma Monkey Fan Club
050.description: Elite membership of this club grants the Dart Monkeys even more power.

001.name: Long Range Darts
001.description: Makes the Dart Monkey shoot further than normal.

002.name: Enhanced Eyesight
002.description: Shoots even further and can detect Camo bloons.

003.name: Crossbow
003.description: Uses a long range Crossbow that can pop 3 layers of Bloon for every hit.

004.name: Sharp Shooter
004.description: Sharp Shooter attacks faster and does powerful Crit shots every few shots that do a lot more damage.

005.name: Crossbow Master
005.description: Crossbow Master shoots really fast and devastates most Bloon types with ease.

600.name: Apex Plasma Master
600.description: Fill the area with Bloon shredding plasma juggernaut balls, leaving nothing behind...
